title: PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working  (after each patch)
body:
I apology for my broken English.

I got this problem : "PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working" after each patch...

I tried to fix it (run as admin, delete files, check for windows updates... nothing works that's why i post this..

And magically a couple of days later everything is just fine -_-
After each patch i gotta wait like 3 days before being able to launch and dl the new patch :/

replies.body: Do you think it's because i still have windows 7 ??  :v
no i dont think so but just try to upgrade to windows 10 and see what happens ;)

nah no  need :p

I've downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool 

It fixed all my problems
